GET /zones/{zone_id}/settings/zaraz/conf.description: Gets latest Zaraz configuration for a zone. It can be preview or published configuration, whichever was the last updated. Secret variables values will not be included.

GET /zones/{zone_id}/settings/zaraz/hist.description: Lists a history of published Zaraz configuration records for a zone.

parameters.description: Ordinal number to start listing the results with. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Maximum amount of results to list. Default value is 10.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The field to sort by. Default is updated_at.
parameters.name: sortField

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

createdAt.description: Date and time the configuration was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time the configuration was last updated

userId.description: Alpha-numeric ID of the account user who published the configuration

description.description: Configuration description provided by the user who published this configuration

200.description: List Zaraz historical configuration records response

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

4XX.description: List Zaraz historical configuration records failure

GET /zones/{zone_id}/settings/zaraz/hist.description: Gets a history of published Zaraz configurations by ID(s) for a zone.

parameters.description: Comma separated list of Zaraz configuration IDs
parameters.name: ids

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

createdAt.description: Date and time the configuration was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time the configuration was last updated

userId.description: Alpha-numeric ID of the account user who published the configuration

allOf.description: Configuration record correspoding to an ID provided in query params
